values.value: All electrical conductors shall be treated as energized. A documented procedure must be developed if the potential exists to encroach beyond established minimum clearance distances from electrical conductors. Minimum clearance distance of 20ft shall be maintained unless documentation from a Qualified Electrician is obtained that identifies the voltage of the conductor and atmospheric conditions allow for clearance to be reduced safely. CFR 1910.332, NFPA 70E
Is there a documented procedure for maintaining minimum clearances from any electrical conductors?
